title: Note Worthy
description: "You don't make it easy to love you, do you, Kitty?Six days to the music festival that will make her career, events planner, Kitty's meticulously scheduled life is thrown into chaos by the reappearance of charming but irresponsible Wezi, her deceased brother's best friend.It's been two years since his disappearance. He'd abandoned her when she needed him most. She should be fuming. Right? But Wezi's always been her weakness and maybe this time things will be different.
author: Dhasi Mwale
